model.agent.property.properties
Class LocationProperty

java.lang.Object
  model.agent.property.Property
      model.agent.property.properties.LocationProperty

public class LocationProperty
extends Property

A Property implementation representing a geograpic location.

nearby

public boolean nearby(LocationProperty lp)
Returns true if this location is near another location. The threshold is set to 3 km.

Parameters:
lp - the other location
Returns:
true or false

toScript

public void toScript(HtmlMapContentGenerator mapContent,
                     java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                     boolean openInfoWindowOnLoad)
Returns the LocationProperty specific javascript to be used for map generation. Set openInfoWindowOnLoad to pop up the infoWindow when the page loads.

Parameters:
mapContent - a content generator for the map
params - the request parameters
openInfoWindowOnLoad - true or false

toScript

public void toScript(HtmlMapContentGenerator mapContent,
                     java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params,
                     int mapIconSize,
                     boolean openInfoWindowOnLoad)
Returns the LocationProperty specific javascript to be used for map generation. Set mapIconSize to the desired size of the marker. Set openInfoWindowOnLoad to pop up the infoWindow when the page loads.

Parameters:
mapContent - a content generator for the map
params - the request parameters
mapIconSize - the size of the map icon
openInfoWindowOnLoad - true or false
